title: The revoltex [sic]. A trage-comedy acted between the Hind and panther, and Religio laici, &c.
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700. Hind and panther. Selections.
notes: A satire on John Dryden, with extracts from his poems.
Running title reads: The revolter. A trage-comedy.
A variant, presumably later, has "Revolter" in place of "Revoltex" in line 2 of title.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
